item.description:
Admission is free, seating is General Admission, regular Museum parking rates apply.

www.northeastern.edu/asi/special-events/happinomics/

The discussion will center on questions of whether money can buy happiness, how and why the mind often mispredicts what will lead to happiness, how individuals can structure their lives to increase their sense of wellbeing, etc. The discussion will be an opportunity to present and discuss cutting-edge social science research with leading scholars in the field.

Join Robin Young, host of WBUR’s Here & Now, as she leads a roundtable discussion with cutting-edge scholars on the Science of Happiness: Harvard psychology professor Daniel Gilbert, Cornell economist Robert Frank, and Harvard Business School’s Michael Norton discuss happiness.

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Discussion: The Science of Happiness (Happinomics: What makes us truly happy)
